title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2020 Comments on Death of 16-Year Old in the English Channel
author: admin
summary: Comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 19 August 2020.
content:
The news of the death of a 16-year-old boy in the Channel is heartbreaking and our thoughts are with his loved ones.
